chapter.title: Appendix A
chapter.para: Following is an example of SystemBuilder output for a successful first build.

informalexample.programlisting: Reading '/~/samba-server.distribution' Starting build of 'samba-server-5-i386' at 2010-02-09 09:10:54 autoclean repos * downloading repodata - 'base' - comps.xml [=========================] 942 kB (00:06) -
